data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pereira, Thiago N. A., Lucinda, Paulo H. F. (2007): A new species of Jupiaba Zanata, 1997 (Ostariophysi, Characiformes, Characidae) from the rio Tocantins drainage, Brazil. Zootaxa 1614: 53-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.179050
